1396430.name: Fantasy Grounds - D&D Icewind Dale Rime of the Frostmaiden
1396430.description:
Feel the cold touch of death in this adventure for the world's greatest roleplaying game.
Rime of the Frostmaiden
North of the Spine of the World and west of the towering Reghed Glacier is a frigid expanse few dare explore, let alone inhabit. This icy land of windswept tundra recently became locked in a perpetual, dark winter without reprieve.
Afraid that the other gods are trying to destroy her, Auril the Frostmaiden, the divine embodiment of winter's fury, has withdrawn to this cold corner of the world to live among mortals. Further, she has cast a terrible spell over Icewind Dale, to the detriment of most of its other denizens.
This product includes:
  • Easy to read Reference Manual
  • images to share with your players
  • maps presented in DM and player versions with dynamic Line of Sight (LOS)
  • stats for NPC and monsters
  • story entries that are editable for keeping notes and making changes
Recommended: D&D Basic Rules, D&D Player's Handbook or D&D Character Customization Pack, D&D Monster Manual
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Dominic Morta
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included D&D fifth edition ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity
